document_data.name: ''Harvest Cup''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Harvest Cup''''' was the [[enchanted]] trophy award annually to the champion of [[West Harbor]]'s [[Harvest Fair]].
document_data.Description: This tarnished [[bronze]] trophy cup bore scratched-on names of West Harbor's champions past, as well as some other things carved into it.
document_data.Powers: The ''Harvest Cup'' had a minor enchantment that allowed casting of the ''[[cure light wounds]]'' spell twice per day.
document_data.History: By [[1374 DR]], the ''Harvest Cup'' had numerous owners. This trophy was awarded to the champion of the Harvest Fair's competitions. The winner held onto the ''Cup'' until the following year's Harvest Fair. In 1374 DR, this ''Cup'' was claimed by [[Kalach-Cha]] and, following a devastating attack on the town of West Harbor, left the [[Mere of Dead Men]] for [[Neverwinter]] with its new owner.
